stripped_text: Each advanced piece of ice protecting this server gets +2 strength. Whenever this upgrade moves to the root of a server, you may place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting that server that has no advancement counters. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text:
Each advanced piece of ice protecting this server gets +2 strength.
Whenever this upgrade moves to the root of a server, you may place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting that server that has no advancement counters.
When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
title: Isaac Liberdade
